name: VividVale
declaringWar: Don't worry, if we win this war, I'll make sure to preserve your culture...
attacked: Your allies won't look at you the same anymore...
defeated: Future generations may not sing the same songs; or even speak the same language... But as long as people remember what was, VividVale is still alive.
denounced: Not all leaders are perfect... So I'll learn from your criticism.
introduction: I am BennyCUBE! And I welcome you to VividVale country. So... What is your culture like..?
declaringFriendship: I have set up a party at a beach for us, west of Vividstrone- ...For when you sign this treaty of Friendship, of course...
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Culture] in cities on [Coastal] tiles
